message: Let's split it 50/50, no need for negotiations!
I'll give you 40, you can't do better than that!
That's a bad deal for me, I want more!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a small share!
You're being too stingy, I'll give you a chance to reconsider!
You're still too generous, I want more!
You're getting closer to giving me what I want!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a tiny bit more!
That's still too little, I'm not giving in yet!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
You're really low-balling me now, I'm not impressed!
You're not getting the upper hand yet, I'll keep fighting!
Last chance, take it or walk away!
You're really squeezing me now, I'm not going to give in!
You're not giving up yet, I won't either!
It's almost over, take the last crumb!
I'll take it all, you're out of options!
Fine, you win. Take it all.
